title: Loneliness (post compo)
description: You are a lonely kitten. Touch colored balls to befriend them and lessen your loneliness. Just beware the evil kittens.

Post-compo version of my Ludum Dare #22 entry. The game is mostly the same, but it works as originally intended: colors changes as you befriends stuff; the music also follow those changes; stuff are spawned through all the playfield...
